data.author: Thomas A. Edison
data.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.

data.author: Aristotle
data.quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.

data.author: Maya Angelou
data.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.

data.author: Benjamin Franklin
data.quote: Well done is better than well said.

data.author: H.G. Wells
data.quote: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.

data.author: Samuel Beckett
data.quote: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.

data.author: Tom Stoppard
data.quote: Every exit is an entry somewhere else.

data.author: Joan of Arc
data.quote: I am not afraid...I was born to do this.

data.author: Napoleon Hill
data.quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline.

data.author: William Wordsworth
data.quote: To begin, begin.

data.author: Marie Osmond
data.quote: If you’re going to be able to look back on something and laugh about it, you might as well laugh about it now.

data.author: Dr. Seuss
data.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind.

data.author: Geri Weitzman
data.quote: Sometimes you gotta create what you want to be part of.

data.author: Og Mandino
data.quote: Failure will never take me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.

data.author: George S. Patton
data.quote: Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.quote: Stay committed to your decisions, but stay flexible in your approach.

data.author: Alice Walker
data.quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.

data.author: Stephen King
data.quote: Talent is cheaper than table salt. What separates the talented individual from the successful one is a lot of hard work.

data.author: Napoleon Hill
data.quote: Effort only fully releases its reward after a person refuses to quit.
